data.title: Snap's ad warning hits Facebook and Google shares. We say don't join the sellers
data.description: The CNBC Investing Club believes members should not join the parade of sellers who are dumping Meta or Alphabet based on Snap's news alone.

data.title: Snap sends shares tumbling with warning on economy and earnings
data.description: Snap Inc said the economy had worsened faster than expected in the last month and the social media company slashed its quarterly forecast, triggering an after-hours sell-off.

data.author: Azman Usmani
data.title: Crisil Says India Inc.'s Climate Disclosures Remain Weak
data.description: Crisil Says India Inc.'s Climate Disclosures Remain Weak

data.title: Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai on inflation, investing in growth, and free speech on the internet
data.description: Google's Sundar Pichai signaled that a sluggish economy could present more obstacles for the internet giant, whose shares have slumped this year.

data.title: Alphabet misses on the top and bottom lines, but doesn't shake our long view on the stock
data.description: While Alphabet's headline numbers missed Street expectations, we believe the underlying results to be better than the after-hours action would have you believe.

data.title: Good news for Amazon, Alphabet: Despite reopening, analyst sees e-commerce growing fast
data.description: While the demand sparked by the Covid-19 pandemic has lessened as physical stores reopen, this "give back" period appears to be behind us, notes Cowen.

data.title: Alphabet earnings are out – here are the numbers
data.description: Alphabet reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

data.title: Citi upgrades Dow Inc, notes it has a history of beating the market during inflationary times
data.description: A strong first quarter for Dow Inc. is indicative of further strength for the chemical maker during inflationary periods, according to Citigroup.
